SEARCH
Package game.mills

Class Node

java.lang.Object
game.mills.Node
public class Node extends Object
The Node class represents a single position on the game board. Each node can be occupied by a player and is associated with a visual circle in the UI.

  • Constructor Summary

    • isOccupied

      public boolean isOccupied()
      Checks whether the node is currently occupied by a player.
      Returns:
      true if the node is occupied, false otherwise.
